T15D4342:155b-0: @155b # // na mo lo ke shva ra ye /
T15D4342:155b-1: shing bzo bas grub pa thob pa ni /
T15D4342:155b-2: dza ga ta lar gar log byung ba'i tshe mi rnams kyis shar phyogs bham ga lar bros so //
T15D4342:155b-3: lam ka na shing bzo ba'i bu cig yod pas
T15D4342:155b-4: mthong nas bros pa'i dge 'dun rnams la brkyang phyag
T15D4342:155b-7: der de ltar byas pa'i rgyu mtshan dris pas /
T15D4342:155b-8: de na re bdag gi pha dad pa che bas /
T15D4342:155b-9: rab byung cig la bsnyen bkur byas /
T15D4342:155b-10: des kyang thugs rje chen po'i sgom bzlas phog nas nyams su blangs /
T15D4342:155b-11: dus ring zhig na nad kyis btab nas shi ste
T15D4342:155b-12: dur khrod du shing brtsigs te dkyil du bcug nas
T15D4342:155b-13: mtha' nas me sbar ba dang thon byung /
T15D4342:155b-14: der dris pas nga khyim du theg bshad do zhes zer ro //
T15D4342:155b-16: nga gshin rje'i skyes bu shin tu 'jigs pa bzhis
T15D4342:155b-17: khyer nas dmyal ba'i gnas su bkum pa na ra
T15D4342:155b-18: ka'i nang mes gang bar bcug pa dang /
T15D4342:155b-19: der bkum pa na ra ka kha zum nas ma tshud phyir bskyed pa dang /
T15D4342:155b-21: yang yang de bzhin du byung bas skyes bu bzhi
T15D4342:155b-22: po 'jigs nas gshin rje chos kyi rgyal po la
T15D4342:155b-23: dris pas / de na re 'dir skye ba'i rgyu
T15D4342:155b-24: zad thugs rje chen po'i bu yin da cig car
T15D4342:155b-25: skyol zhes zer nas bskyal ba dang nga'i nad drag
T15D4342:155b-27: de phyir rab tu byung ba mthong tshad la brkyang phyag 'tshal zhing bsnyen bkur byed /
T15D4342:155b-28: bya ba thams cad bzhag nas sgom bzlas byed pa cig byung /
T15D4342:155b-29: bdag kyang pha'i rjes su bgyid pa lags zer ro //
T15D4342:155b-30: sngags pa kharsa p'a ni'i snying po bgrang ba cig la yang de kho na bzhin byung skad /
